title: SimChat Entity Config
description: Schema for SimChat entity configuration files in config/simchat/entities/<entityId>.json. Place both .json configs and .png images in the entities folder. Falls back to default.json and default.png if entity-specific files not found.

name.description: Default display name for this entity (used when dialogue doesn't specify entityName)

subtitle.description: Default subtitle for this entity (e.g., company, title)

avatar.description: Avatar ID to use (defaults to entityId). Loads from config/simchat/entities/<avatar>.png. Falls back to default.png.

examples.$comment: default.json - fallback config for all entities without specific configs
examples.name: Unknown
examples.subtitle: Stranger
